Class StudentMainController

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.controller.StudentMainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class StudentMainController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for handling student interactions in the main student interface.

      Parameters:

      published - A boolean indicating whether the quiz has been published.
      quiz - The quiz to be formatted.

      public static String[] formatString(String input)
      Helper function to remove whitespaces and split a string by the "|" character.
      Parameters:
      input - The input string to be formatted.
      Returns:
      An array of strings split by the "|" character, or null if the input is null.
